name: On the House
description:
Controls:

Left Click  - move

Space - attack / interact

This was going to be my GMTK 2022 Gam Jam submission (which would've been my second gam jam ever); but alas, due to issues when building beside issues with itch, I was unable to meet the deadline. I hope you enjoy anyways

The game itself meets the theme of "Roll of the dice" by have the player be, wouldn't you know, a die which has different attacks depending on which side is face up. Bringing together this concept with the larger theme of randomness as a whole, I have put together a casino-themed action rogue-like for you to enjoy.

I am planning on continuing to update the project but the Jam release versions are still available.
